Malihe Alikhani Assistant Professor at the University of Pittsburgh Email: malihe@pitt.edu Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick Assistant Professor, University of California, San Diego Email: tberg@cs.cmu.edu Office: 6403 Gates & Hillman Centers William Cohen Director of Research Engineering at Google AI and SCS Consulting Professor Email: wcohen@cs.cmu.edu Office: 8217 Gates & Hillman Centers Phone: 412-268-7664 Christopher Dyer Senior Staff Scientist for DeepMind Email: cdyer@cs.cmu.edu Phone: Research Areas: Machine Learning, Machine Translation, Natural Language Processing and Computational Linguistics Madhavi Ganapathiraju Associate Professor Department of Biomedical Informatics at University of Pittsburgh Email: madhavi@pitt.edu Office: Gates & Hillman Centers Phone: Matthias Grabmair Assistant Professor, Technical University of Munich, Germany Email: mgrabmai@andrew.cmu.edu Phone: Lu Jiang Staff Research Scientist at Google Email: lujiang@google.com Alon Lavie Vice President of Language Technologies at Unbabel and Consulting Professor at the Language Technologies Institute Email: alavie@cs.cmu.edu Phone: Research Areas: Machine Translation, Natural Language Processing and Computational Linguistics Michael Mauldin Inventor of Lycos (early Internet search engine) in 1994 Florian Metze Associate Research Professor Email: fmetze@cs.cmu.edu Office: 202 407 South Craig Street Phone: 412-268-8984 Research Areas: Machine Learning, Speech Processing Thomas Schaaf Principal Research Scientist at 3M | M*Modal Ravi Starzl Adjunct Professor Email: rstarzl@andrew.cmu.edu Office: 6701 Gates & Hillman Centers Phone: 412-268-8425 Yulia Tsvetkov Assistant Professor at the University of Washington Email: yuliats@cs.washington.edu Office: Gates & Hillman Centers Phone: Monika Woszczyna Head of Speech Technology Group at Multimodal Technologies Inc. qa_list.question: What are William Cohen's roles and contact information?
qa_list.answer: William Cohen is the Director of Research Engineering at Google AI and SCS Consulting Professor. His office is located in 8217 Gates & Hillman Centers, and his phone number is 412-268-7664.

What are William Cohen's roles and contact information?
William Cohen is the Director of Research Engineering at Google AI and SCS Consulting Professor. His office is located in 8217 Gates & Hillman Centers, and his phone number is 412-268-7664.

qa_list.question: What are Christopher Dyer's roles and research areas?
qa_list.answer: Christopher Dyer is a Senior Staff Scientist for DeepMind. His research areas include Machine Learning, Machine Translation, Natural Language Processing, and Computational Linguistics.
